website_summaries.verdict: Professionally designed to withstand photo shoots. Provides a sweat and humidity-proof undercoat.
pros: Keeps eyeshadow from smudging and creasing and brings out the pigment
cons: Good for oily skin but can be drying for other skin types
A few complaints that eyeshadow still faded

customer_reviews.title: Simply simple solution!!!! AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. I’ve always had oily skin, even on my eyelids, so eyeshadows usually crease up and/or wear off by the end of a long workday. Since using SmashBox eyelid primer my eye shadow stays put all day! I’ve used a few different primers but this one makes the others I’ve used look like a joke. This is my first tube. A little goes a long way! I’ve been using this product for about a month or two and there is still plenty left. Don’t let the small tube fool you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burns

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't crease
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It doesn't get in creases. And one day it was over 100° and I was all sweaty from working and it still didn't crease. I was surprised. I'll definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Can't do my makeup without this
customer_reviews.text: I started using primer a few years ago. Initially I was using Bare Escentuals primer, but a friend recommended the SmashBox primer, and I believe it does a better job of setting my eyeshadow - especially if I sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eyeshadow primer that's tacky and works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to eyeshadow primer. A little goes a long way. It's tacky and when you apply your shadow or pigment, it stays in place all day! I would recommend Too Faced Glitter Glue for more glitter shadows but this product holds shadow in its place! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dussia-Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeshadow primer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and am very happy with it. It helps eyeshadow to stay on all day and is not greasy. The only complaint that I have is that as you get closer to the end of the tube it tends to get drier but overall I would recommended this shadow primer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tesser

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: Great primer that doesn't even feel like there is anything there. Goes on smooth and keeps makeup in place all day. Product arrived really fast. I received earlier than what was estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P

customer_reviews.title: MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: My favorite primer on the planet, my eyeshadow lasts basically until the morning... mind you I of course should’ve washed it off the night beforehand. As long as you warm it with your fingers and then pat it it’s MAGIC!
customer_reviews.author: ashton sinclair kenney

customer_reviews.title: The BEST concealer yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST concealer I’ve tried! My eye make up stayed fresh all day without the eyeshadow pooling in the creases of my eyelids. It kept my eyelids hydrated and prevented some of the minor eyelid sagging under my brow line that I was just starting to notice. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: mvan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I absolutely love this eyeshadow primer. Keeps eyeshadow on all day, no wearing off or creasing to worry about with this eyeshadow primmer!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So much better than the naked brand everyone recommends. Applies super smooth and it's not chunky like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kue

customer_reviews.title: The ONE and ONLY Eye Shadow Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many shadow primers and none have remotely compared to Smashbox's Photo Finish 24hr Shadow Primer. A tiny dab of primer glides on easily to prevent your eyeliner and shadow from disappearing on a hot, humid day. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dionne

customer_reviews.title: All day hold
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My eyeshadow doesn’t move all day! Some other primers make blending very difficult but this one allows me to blend my eyeshadow flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Beedle

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite shadow primer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shadow primer. It keeps my eye shadow on all day and you only need to use a small dab on your finger so it lasts FOREVER. It also makes your shadow colors pop so your eyes look great.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This seriously works! It has kept my eye shadow ...
customer_reviews.text: This seriously works! It has kept my eye shadow looking exactly the same as when I put it on after 20 hours multiple times... Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Eyeshadow Mate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a long time and it’s wonderful for keeping my eyeshadow fresh and preventing creasing.
customer_reviews.author: A user.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was everything I wanted Fast delivery .. would buy again 5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I have more oily skin than the average person and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have more oily skin than the average person and most makeup fade away after about 5 hours. This primer helps eyeshadows to stay put on my lids up to 6 hours, and after that the colors still look approximately 80% as vivid as when first applied up to 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all over my face!! It’s absolutely amazing! My order arrived on time with no issues. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: StotheC

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Eye shadow is definitely more noticeable over top of this. You only need a tiny bit. Be careful not to get on your lashes or they end up stiff and your mascara will look terrible. This tube will last forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I've been using it for almost 2 years and cannot say more positive things about it. Keeps my make up flawless even through an intense workout! Even tricky eyeliner and eye brow powder - it holds the make up in place perfectly ALL day - I rarely have to re-apply throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Shadow Primer
customer_reviews.text: This primer is excellent. Eye makeup doesn’t move all day! Looks the same when you take it off as it did in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Helene Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really like that this product does what it claims to do. I simply love it.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye primer. I buy it again and again. Never an embarrassing crease or greasy lid. Works morning till night. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Sisolak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome primer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I apply it before I apply my eye shadow and it will last all day with out smearing or melt off like my eye shadow normally does.
customer_reviews.author: e.crumd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Noticed an instant difference the first day using it that I no longer had eye shadow lines mid day- this made my eye shadow last the entire work day and evening! Great product I will be consistently purchasing :)
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kamminga

customer_reviews.title: This works really well. Keeps my eye shadow looking ...
customer_reviews.text: This product normally works great. Keeps my eye shadow looking fresh all day long. However, the tube i got this time was dried out. When i pressed on the tube, the product came out in a one inch chunk which is a waste as you can't put it back inside to stay fresh until you use it all.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Smashbox photo finish
customer_reviews.text: This is my eyeshadow primer. My eyelids get oily for some reason and my eyeshadow would always crease. So after research I decided to give this one a try. Works wonders and it only takes a small amount. It is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My eyeshadow stays put all day long!! I love this stuff!! I have oily skin and my eyelids have a tendency to get oily and this stuff keeps my eyeshadow put all day long like glue. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best eyelid primer, ever! And I barely use any so it will last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: LizzieMac

customer_reviews.title: Best primer
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this primer. I have used almost every eyelid primer out there and none of them worked for me. I have somewhat oily eyelids and this product works great with both matte and shimmer eyeshadow. You only neee a tiny bit to last the entire day. I use along with the smashbox photo finish primer spray. So happy I ended up buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Primer..
customer_reviews.text: I love the primer, i would say it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sitti Amina Tizon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My eye shadow doesn't smudge and lasts all night now.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: This product definitely help the eyeshadow to stay on 24hrs ...
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely help the eyeshadow to stay on 24hrs. I can't put make up without it. I didn't put 5 stars just because the boxe came all crushed and open. Product was not affected and didn't seem to be opened.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this keeps my eye makeup in place
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lee

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, goes on smooth and really does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: but good product. Works great
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than expected, but good product. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Naparano

customer_reviews.title: From an experienced user!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God, Where have you been all my life! This is the BEST! It even withstands a shower. I am over 60 and have tried all kinds of similar products and this is the absolute best!
customer_reviews.author: Cecile F. Eisenhart

customer_reviews.title: Love the stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I’ve always loved it. It’s my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must.  Have.
customer_reviews.text: I have what is called 'oily eyelids' and have never had an eyeshadow that didn't crease or an eyeliner that didn't disappear within a couple of hours. This stuff is great! FYI, I read the review from someone who used a shimmer shadow over the primer and didn't like the look by end of day. She might have had crepe-y skin, like I do, in which case she should only use a matte shadow. Shimmer only accentuates wrinkles and crepe-y-ness.
customer_reviews.author: M Morris

customer_reviews.title: This is the best eye shadow base ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye shadow base ever. When I come home from work, my eye shadow looks just as good as when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great product. Helps my eye shadows stay on much ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. Helps my eye shadows stay on much longer and looking the same as when I first apply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My eyes lids get sweaty being in hot weather and this primer works amazing for my eyeliner! It now lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep makeup in place. Not the greatest product I've ever used but definitely not the worst. Comes in a good sized tube. I use it for my under eyes every day (because it's thicker/stickier than the under eye primer and doesn't slide like under eye primer does) and it seems to help keep my concealer in place for most of the day. Creases do happen after a couple hours though so just make sure you are still touching up throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRIMER!!! All you need is a tiny amount and my shadow lasts all day! I’ve tried other primers but this is my absolute favorite! If I don’t wash my face before bed (I hardly do this) but my shadow will still be on the next morning! I can’t believe how long it lasts! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Renea ohio

customer_reviews.title: My go to primer!
customer_reviews.text: I always use this primer before I put my eyeshadow on. My shadow stays on all day and night, and that is important to me. I have tried others, but this one works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this and here's why.......
customer_reviews.text: It is too thick and because of this pulls on my eye skin, even if I have warmed it up in my fingers. There are other competing brands that dont have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: OroPreto

customer_reviews.title: Eyeshadow Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time user of this primer and it works amazingly well. From the morning to night, even after a sweaty workout of boxing - my shadow does not budge. I wear a loose powder shadow and apply with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Cdiggy

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This really keeps your eyeshadow on and goes on smoothly. Wish it came with an applicator but I use one from my other primer and squeeze it on there. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It works! Applies easily, not cakey, a little goes a long way, and it doesn't irritate my eyes. My eyeshadow stays put throughout the whole day - very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Clark

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Silky smooth to put on, just use a tiny, tiny amount.
customer_reviews.author: Kbo

customer_reviews.title: WISH I FOUND IT YEARS AGO!! AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I use to look like I had black eyes by the end of the day because my eye liner would wear off. Now everything stays right where it is supposed to be. AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pwrbk125

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works all day! This tube will last a few months since you need so little.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Smashbox 24hr eye primer
customer_reviews.text: Nice eye primary. The thicker quality is nice, does need a few min. to dry. Had used smashbox primer years ago, wasn't impressed. So glad I tried again. This Photo Finish 24hr does what it says. I just wish my eye makeup lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: 5jos

customer_reviews.title: A must-have if you wear eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: This is weightless and keeps eyeshadows just as you applied them all day long! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: How many cosmetic products actually deliver what they promise : THIS ONE DOES. SHADOW STAYS IN PLACE ALL DAY LONG AND DOES NOT CREASE OR BECOME OILY.
customer_reviews.author: G24ever

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff abit pricey
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff abit pricey, but does what it says ,,mine was hard to get out of tube,,but goes on smooth and feels so good ,,keeps eyeshadow on longer and I use it to help lipstick stay on longer
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to keep your eye-shadow in place all day long! Absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: thepreacherswife

customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Holds ur eyeshadow and eyeliner even when its hot and humid
customer_reviews.author: DONNA MELTON

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Night and day difference when using this product (as opposed to going without). My eye makeup stays put all day. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this item. holds my shadow and eyeliner perfectly ALL day
customer_reviews.author: Carla P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Definitely makes a difference to use this primer. Eyeshadow stays on longer and only takes a a small amount to cover entire lid. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product,can't live without it.The best shadow primer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: susan fidler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST primer for eye shadow and eye liner. I use it every day. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Price

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The tube lasts a very long time because such a small amount is needed. My eye makeup lasts all day when I use it! This is now a staple in my cosmetic bag!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my eyeshadow stays on perfectly trough out the whole day!
customer_reviews.author: natalija

customer_reviews.title: The only one!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and even the waterproof pencils get smeared around my eyes in a few hours. This helps me get through my day without having to deal with raccoon eyes!! Only need a tiny bit of it too so the tube will last for a long time! If this review has helped you in any way, please click the YES button. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BlueZebra

customer_reviews.title: i received a sample from sephora and love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: i received a sample from sephora and love this stuff. My eyeshadow stays in place all day and makes my shadow really adhere when applying
customer_reviews.author: krisann67

customer_reviews.title: No more shadow crease!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have a slightly hooded eye that makes eyeshadows crease. Photo Finish to the rescue - no more eye crease issues! I have sensitive eyes and a lot of these primer type products make my eyelid itch - not Photo Finish! Also, it does not give you a dry caked on look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SmashBox Photo Finish Shadow Primer, 0.41 Ounce
